channel.title: The REAL tea party
channel.description:
So whenever the debate hell tea party thread pops up, I get excited expecting people to be nicely and calmly sipping their tea and discussing completely boring topics such as weather and cricket, and am dissapointed to see it is just people throwing things at other people as per custom of the debating halls.
Well, here it is! I've set up some comfortable floral print chairs beside this lovely window overlooking the garden, so grab a cup of your favorite tea, bring a platter of pasteries and sit and enjoy the black mesa tea party!

item.title: The REAL tea party

Alrighty then…

(Reaches for a note pad for the yummy stuff needed to make this happen)

Read full topic

item.title: The REAL tea party
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
:lol:

Rumballs

12 oz. Semi Sweet Chocolate chips
1/3 Cup Light corn syrup
1 C Rum or Burbon
5 C Crushed Vanilla Wafers (about 2 boxes of wafers)
1 C Powdered sugar
2 C Walnuts chopped
Regular sugar to roll the balls in

  1. Melt the chocolate and corn syrup slowly in the microwave. About 1 minute is all that is needed to make it slightly creamy.
  2. Add the Rum or Bourbon to the chocolate and mix as best as possible. (It will be very watery.)
  3. Add chocolate mixture to the rest of the ingredients in a large bowl and mix thoroughly. Let sit for 1/2 hour to set.
  4. Compact and roll the balls in the palm of your hand about the small spoonful size, then roll around in regular sugar.
  5. Let sit another 1/2 hour before bagging or closing them in a container.

Read full topic

item.title: The REAL tea party
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
CatzEyes93:

Oh my! Rum balls! You know I think I will have a few of those please. You know I tried making some of those last year for Christmas. Somewhere along the way I lost count of how much rum to put in the batch and I think I made girlfriend sick. She kept laughing and snorting like a common street flower girl, and she kept saying the oddest of things. Something about toys, games and night time parlor games.

I dare say I won’t be trying that recipe again! :takes a bite of a rumball:

I’m sure you like some rumball. :3

Read full topic

item.description:
Oh, Catz, could you write the recipe for all of us?

By the way, I am considering reprogramming the turrets to shoot anyone interested on finishing this party.

Read full topic

item.title: The REAL tea party
item.dc:creator: HumanParadoxx
item.description:
Bluemen230:

I presume the computers are controlling these?

It’s the only way to be sure

Oh, coffee cake! Could you give me a bit of it?

And answering your question, mr. Bluemen230, the turrets are like these:
https://mmg.photobucket.com/image/skaarj%20mothership%20turrets/robo422/MothershipShot4.jpg.html?src=www

The Skaarj (Unreal) were very kind for letting me borrow the technology, besides I got out the ship with some bruises and broken bones.

But, with some improvements, I’ve put your weapons on them, before swapfox’s parachute somehow acquired those holes.

Read full topic
